data.name: JUST HOOPS - Demo
data.description:
*** This demo is no longer updated nor playable. ***

Try or buy the last release of the game with more content, new packs, online mode and hand tracking: bit.ly/justhoops-quest

changelog.change_log:
** Demo no longer playable **
Sends to JUST HOOPS store page

JUST HOOPS - BIG UPDATE
=======================

- Online multiplayer 1vs1
- Online private room up to 4 players
- Cross play PICO 3/4 vs QUEST 2/PRO
- Background matchmaking while playing solo
- Fast menu & shiny multiplayer room
- Ready Player Me Avatars
- fix: point to Playfab production servers
- fix: haptic feedbacks back
- fix: online challenges selection
- fix: background matchmaking cooldown

---
version 1.4.491#1c0a26694

JUST HOOPS demo - BIG UPDATE
===========================

- Online multiplayer 1vs1
- Cross play Pico3/4 vs Quest2/Pro 
- Background matchmaking while playing solo
- Fast menu & shiny multiplayer room
- Ready Player Me Avatars
- Color passthrough on Quest Pro !

*Online multiplayer is not available on Quest1* 

---
version 1.4.444#99c889b7e

=== v1.3.78, b442db8f6 ===

- Improve access to the store game page

=== 1.3.67, e94d750 ===
First version
Limited version of the game:
- controllers only
- first levels and warm-up challenge
- leaderboards are read-only
- passthrough & MRC enabled
0c4366b - Remove Pico plugin package to avoid Manifest warnings from Oculus Store

0c4366b - Oculus: Quit app when login fails to avoid staying in an empty room with no interaction possible...
rebuild  to be sure DEMO define is on
